Itachi creates a [[water clone]] to punch and hold the opponent. Kisame slashes them into the air while using the remains of the destroyed water clone to summon a [[Water Release: Water Shark Bullet Technique|water shark]] to strike the opponent. The opponent falls in the wake of Itachi's [[Tsukuyomi]] in which the opponent withers away as though they were water.
